ComicInfo.Summary: Last issue's battle has drawn Garrison out of seclusion, but a dark figure from his past resurfaces who hopes to force him back into retirement...permanently! Meanwhile, Gully learns more about the power of her gloves--and the fate of her father.
ComicInfo.Writer: Joe Madureira,Munier Sharrieff,Adam Warren,Joe Madureira,Munier Sharrieff,Adam Warren
ComicInfo.Title: Red Monika: Interlude
